about_the_game:
Skeletons are invading and your only defense is a toaster and a chicken! Embark on a whimsical adventure through a land plagued by pesky skeletons! Uncover weird and wacky weapon synergies to fight back against the bony baddies. Along the way, you'll gather a rag tag group of heroes who will aid you on your mission- will you have the guts to stop the necromancer's plans and save the world?

CRAZY WEAPON COMBINATIONS

Discover an arsenal of crazy weapon combinations, from explosive toast to homing robot chickens, and customize your loadout to suit your playstyle as you wreak havoc on your enemies.

ALL ABOARD THE TRAIN

Transform your train into a formidable base of operations, also providing a sanctuary for the friends you meet along the way.

FORGE UNLIKELY ALLIANCES

Befriend a cast of intriguing characters, each with their own unique abilities and motivations, and recruit them to join your quest to defeat the necromancer.

ENDLESS REPLAYABILITY

Dive into procedurally generated levels filled with surprises and challenges, ensuring that no two runs are ever the same. Test your skills and adaptability as you strive to overcome the ever-growing threats that await you.

short_description: Calcium Chaos is a casual Twin-Stick Roguelite that takes you on a journey by train to confront the necromancer and their skeleton army. Get ready to explore a world filled with crazy weapon combinations and unexpected allies as you embark on an epic quest to save the world!
